H0.text: Which was the longest moon landing. Apollo 15

H1.text: Which was the longest moon landing. Apollo 11

H2.text: Which was the longest moon landing. Apollo 16

H3.text: Which was the longest moon landing. Apollo17

A4.text: Apollo 15 spent 18.5 hours on the Moon's surface during four extravehicular activities (EVA).

A5.text: The mission set a record for the longest Apollo flight to that point.
